title: Create New Property Listing
description: An agent has signed a new listing agreement. They need to create the property listing in the MLS.

tasks.description: Gather all property details, photos, and the seller's disclosure document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles all necessary information including property features and required legal documents.

tasks.description: Enter all property data into the MLS new listing form.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately fills out all required fields in the MLS system.

tasks.description: Upload photos and all required documents (e.g., disclosures, floor plans) to the listing.
tasks.expected_outcome: All media and documents are successfully uploaded and attached to the new MLS listing.
